full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BLA MA RGYAN DRUG MCHOG GNYIS DANG BCAS PA LA PHYAG MCHOD 'BUL BA'I TSUL LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR BKOD PA BYIN RLABS NYIN BYED 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (CES RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO RGYAN DRUG MCHOG GNYIS CHOS BSRUNG YE SHES KYI MGON PO DANG BCAS PA LA PHYAG MCHOD GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I TSUL LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR BKOD PA BYIN RLABS NYIN BYED 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA @016A *, ,ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA'I DPA' BO RDO RAMS PA BLO BZANG RAB GSAL GYIS BKRA SHIS PA'I LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS NAN TAN CHEN PO YANG YANG BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SANGS RGYAS KUN 'DUS KYI NGO BO BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG YAB SRAS RNAMS KYIS BKA' DRIN KHO NA NYE BAR 'TSE BA, ,SH'AKYA'I RJES 'JUG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL KYIS RANG GSHAGS CHOS 'BYOR DGA' TSUL DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG GSER ZHUN COD PAn 'CHANG BA'I RING LUGS PHYOGS DUS KUN DU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
